history.proof: intros. unfold dfun_leq. intros. srun best use: poset_trans unfold: dfun_leq.

original: intros. intros H1 H2. unfold dfun_leq. intros. apply clos_trans_ind with y. - apply t_step. apply H1. - intros x0 y0 z0 H3 IH1 H4 IH2. apply t_trans with y0. + apply IH1. apply fun_trans with y0; auto. + apply IH2. apply fun_trans with y0; auto.
